---
subtitle: "Posts"



listing:
  contents: posts
  sort: "date desc"
  type: default
  # type: grid
  # grid-columns: 1
  feed: true
  categories: true
  sort-ui: false
  filter-ui: true
page-layout: full
---

<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    const subtitleElement = document.querySelector('.quarto-title-block .subtitle');
    const categoryLinksContainer = document.querySelector('.quarto-listing-categories-links');

    if (subtitleElement && categoryLinksContainer) {
        const originalSubtitleText = subtitleElement.textContent.trim(); // "Posts"

        const updateSubtitle = () => {
            const activeFilterLink = categoryLinksContainer.querySelector('a.active');
            if (activeFilterLink) {
                const categoryName = activeFilterLink.textContent.trim();
                // Quarto의 'All' 필터는 data-filter-category="All" 속성을 가집니다.
                const isAllFilter = activeFilterLink.dataset.filterCategory === "All" || categoryName.toLowerCase() === "all";

                if (isAllFilter) {
                    subtitleElement.textContent = originalSubtitleText;
                } else {
                    subtitleElement.textContent = `${categoryName} ${originalSubtitleText}`;
                }
            } else {
                subtitleElement.textContent = originalSubtitleText;
            }
        };

        const observer = new MutationObserver((mutationsList, observer) => {
            for(const mutation of mutationsList) {
                if (mutation.type === 'attributes' && mutation.attributeName === 'class') {
                    if (mutation.target.matches('.quarto-listing-category')) {
                         updateSubtitle();
                         return; 
                    }
                } else if (mutation.type === 'childList') {
                    updateSubtitle(); // 카테고리 링크 목록 자체가 변경될 경우 (드문 경우)
                    return;
                }
            }
        });

        observer.observe(categoryLinksContainer, {
            attributes: true, 
            childList: true,  
            subtree: true     
        });

        // 페이지 로드 시 초기 업데이트 (URL 등으로 필터가 이미 활성화된 경우 대비)
        updateSubtitle();

    } else {
        if (!subtitleElement) {
            console.warn('Dynamic subtitle: Subtitle element (.quarto-title-block .subtitle) not found.');
        }
        if (!categoryLinksContainer) {
            console.warn('Dynamic subtitle: Category links container (.quarto-listing-categories-links) not found.');
        }
    }
});
</script>
